boat.full_description:
Built as demonstration boat for Fisher Boat Company.   Shown at Southampton International Boat Shows 2013 and 2014

Hull completed bt Neil Marine, Sri Lanka, under accreditation.  Fit Out, Commissioning and Cretification by Fisher Boat Company, Chichester.

Builder's Certificate 9 May 2012.

Significant "Extras to Standard" include:

Engine upgrade from Beta 14 to Beta 20.

Halyards led to cockpit.

Lifting bowsprit.

Shore power with intelligent battery charging .

Celon teak deck upgraded to Burma teak.

Teak battens to cockpit upgraded to teak gratings.

Upgrade to larger portholes.
boat.name: Yulya
